content.prompt: Assume that the economy is at full-employment equilibrium in the diagram shown above. Which of the following would lead to stagflation?

choices.label: A leftward shift of the short-run aggregate supply curve only
A rightward shift of the short-run aggregate supply curve only
A leftward shift of the aggregate demand curve only
A rightward shift of the aggregate demand curve only
A rightward shift in both the short-run aggregate supply curve and the aggregate demand curve

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run
